attributes.action: NO FOI VETO ON IRAQ CABINET PAPERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Sorry for rejecting your petition but there must be a request for an action. If you would like to write to the PM, the address is: 

10 Downing Street,
London,
SW1A 2AA

Email should be reinstated in the near future.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
